snippet.title: BALLYGON - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Available May 18, 2022!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1889770/BALLYGON/
Tilt the stage, turn the camera, and roll your way to the goal in BALLYGON, a new labyrinth marble-rolling game! Challenge over 150 stages with unique mechanics in polygonal worlds. Go ball in with BALLYGON!

Developed by Anthony Seeha

Official Website: https://ballygon.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BALLYGON
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/anthonyseeha
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fNnXDDTzgR

#ballygon #anthonyseeha
